extendedInfo.description: Active Lockscreen Kawaii Smiling Clouds ThemeColor your world pink by downloading this theme! Smiling clouds and lots of good energy will make you smile tooâ¦This Kawaii style theme was designed and developed by Active Lockscreen, the Smiling Clouds theme will improve your Active Lockscreen byâ¢	Providing a pleasing visual experience while using Active Lockscreenâ¢	Delivering a theme with matching buttons, zippers and graphicsThe Active Lockscreen offers users many features and benefitsâ¢	Fast and easy launch of any application â ideal when you are on the Goâ¢	Display your favorite gallery pictures, Facebook feeds and other apps of your choice while your phone is lockedâ¢	Set up shortcuts to any application you want or just let the appâs smart algorithm set your commonly used shortcuts for you â¢	Easy access with one clickâ¢	Reduce clicks to call a contact, launch an app, play a game, browse the web, play music, get Facebook updates or just unlock your phone â¢	Individual optimization to serve your needs (learns what you need from your previous actions)  â¢	Set up frequent contacts for easy calling even when you are on the goâ¢	Call your recent contacts or open the dialerâ¢	Launch your recently used apps â¢	Send Text messages through your SMS Inbox or any other text app such as WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Email, Gmail, Twitter or LinkedIn â¢	Launch the camera or any picture and graphics related apps installed on your phone such as Instagram, Mobli, Food, Adobe Photoshop ExpressThe Active Lockscreen is easy to use and is the best app for unlocking your phone.- all you need to do is place your finger on the lockscreen ring and drag it to the relevant action or shortcut. Enjoy our new background themes with matching graphics! Important:This is not a standalone app,  you need to download the LATEST version of the Active Lockscreen app in order to apply this theme https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.celltick.lockscreen
